best_gem_comment: The class with Anne LeBrun is rewarding if you put in the work. She doesn't do an incredible job teaching the material in lecture, but if you can go to office hours and get help then the class is great. Anne is super excited about teaching economics and it shows, you can tell she loves teaching Econ. Really light work load, so a gem if you get economics really easily.
best_gem_comment_short: Really light work load, so a gem if you get economics really easily.

course_title: Using Big Data to Solve Economic and Social Problems 001
course_title_2023: Using Big Data to Solve Economic and Social Problems
best_gem_comment: Easy class. Definite GEM! Interesting material and if you get a good section you basically are walked through the lab, which is the only homework component other than 2 Emperical projects throughout the semester. Honestly, the Emperical projects are basically the only work to do.

This is class is hard. Don't take this as an elective. Only if it's required. And if it's required, take it RIGHT after you do Stat 100 or 104 or Ec 50, and be prepared for this to be your hardest class. Don't take another pset class the same semester as this one unless you're built like that, and make sure you have at least 1 gem in rotation.
best_gem_comment_short: Don't take another pset class the same semester as this one unless you're built like that, and make sure you have at least 1 gem in rotation.
